review.body: Awesome i love the series its great a romance/magical novel <3

book.title: Miss Frost Solves A Cold Case : A Nocturne Falls Mystery (Jayne Frost, #1)

review.body: Absolutely amazing start to a series! A fun mystery read set in Nocturne Falls. Cant wait to read the next and see what happens with all the elves and the store.

This was a refreshing, unique take on the paranormal genre. Trinity is a foster child who is looked after with more compassion by her best friend (and best friend's mother) than she is by her own foster mother (or foster monster as she is often referred to in the novel, much to my glee). Trinity...
Too brutal

book.title: Robin: Son of Batman, Vol. 1: Year of Blood

review.body:
Hi, my name is Nic, and I'm such an emotional marshmallow that actually cried reading Robin: Son of Batman.

I'll link to my No Flying No Tights review once it's up.

Fun and Sexy

Love the sarcasm and banter between Blake and Jennifer. However, I could done with less of her dramatics. Blake has shown time and again that he deserved the good benefit of doubt of his love for Jennifer. Because love is a powerful emotion that wins every time.

This is by far the best book in the series but I've been waiting and hoping for Sebastian's book. It did not disappoint!! Got to learn a lot about his past and the who and whys as to the way he is not going to say much else because that would ruin it. This is a must read!!
This book is really different than most of John Green's other books. It has a sense of hopelessness that really makes you want to keep reading!!

book.title: Short Flights: Thirty-Two Modern Writers Share Aphorisms of Insight, Inspiration, and Wit

review.body: "Short Flights seeks to explicate the form, history, and practice of the aphorism as well as inject contemporary tidbits into the collective literary psyche. Most of us are familiar with the quips of Oscar Wilde and the memorable one-liners from the endless plays of William Shakespeare. So much w...

A Searching Heart is a gentle, thoughtful novel that perfectly captures the feelings of a young woman stuck between the situation of childhood and the wide-open world of adulthood‚Äîwhen she‚Äôs already crossed the threshold of womanhood in both mind and body. As usual, Janette Oke masterfully portra...
Good read full of surprising events

Destined to be a classic tale of friendship and overcoming fears.
This wonderfully illustrated book tells a simple but effective story that will encourage children to overcome nighttime fears, especially with the help of others. I hope this unlikely friendship of Mole and Wolf continues to flouris...
An enchanting read!!

"Summer Requiem, written over the last twenty years, is a quiet and meditative book much like his earlier one, All You Who Sleep Tonight. In this volume, the motif of the incarnadine‚Äîincluding the ruddy summer sunset image on the cover‚Äîrecurs: ‚ÄúRose light enflamed the eastern sky‚Äù (‚ÄúOne Morning‚Äù)...

I received an ARC copy of this book in exchange for an honest review.

I enjoyed this book. It is the first book by PJ Adams that I have read and I now want to meet more. Jess Taylor goes for a long over due visit to see her grandparents in an assisted living center. She learns that her grandmother...

Absolutely amazing read!! I have read everything by this author and she is a great writer, she creates wonderful characters that you cant help but love or hate as well as an amazing world. This is a fast read with sex scenes so if thats not your thing.
four stars for the stories but only 2.5 for the stories' matrix story.

book.title: The Fog Comes on Little Pig Feet

review.body: Read during my boarding school obsession ca. age ten, and forgotten until recently.

book.title: I'm Sick Now What?: A Balanced Approach to Medicine and God's Healing

review.body: What a powerful, practical book for those sick and those who want to stay healthy! Dr. Butterworth is a pastor and doctor in South Africa and has seen much. In this book he brings together the relationship between unforgiveness and sickness. He gives practical steps to forgiving those in your lif...
A good ghostly mystery. I liked the characters voices. Action and humor.
